author: National Weather Service
title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 1 at 12:15PM MST until January 2 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
text:
By National Weather Service ,
1 days ago January 1, 2025 9:48 PM Published January 1, 2025 12:15 PM. * WHAT…Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8. inches with isolated locations possibly seeing amounts nearing 10. inches. * WHERE…Jackson Hole and Star Valley. * WHEN…Until 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS…Travel could be...
